title: By the seat of our pants
creator_credit: Peter Monger, Julie Cutler, Peter Norton, Social Welfare Dept of Victoria and Task Force
brief_description: A film about the problems of unemployment. Interspersed with comments from sympathetic as well as unsympathetic ‘experts’, four young people living in Prahran tell their stories of largely unfortunate experiences with employers and government institutions.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Monger, Julie Cutler, Peter Norton, Social Welfare Dept of Victoria and Task Force
